---
id: topup-wallet 
title: Topup Wallet
sidebar_label: Topup Wallet
---

import { Box, Heading, Text, Card, Image, Button, Flex } from "rebass";

**Method :** <span style={{ color: "orange", fontWeight: "bold" }}>POST</span><br/>
URL : `https://open.revenuemonster.my/v3/wallet/topup`<br/>
Sandbox URL : `https://sb-open.revenuemonster.my/v3/wallet/topup`

:::note
Topup merchant wallet
:::

### Request Parameters

| Parameter  | Type   | Description          | Example                     |
| ---------- | ------ | -------------------- | --------------------------- |
| `redirect` | String | Redirect after topup | "https://revenuemonster.my" |
| `amount`   | uint64 | Topup Amount         | 10                          |

> Example Request

```json
curl --location --request POST "{{open_base_path}}/v3/wallet/topup" \
--header "Content-Type: application/json" \
--header "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IjIwMTgtMy0xOCIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..RKtXykw3y0ov3mKKa_K2h5FZB2jXtqf3gNRwwnzzA4xTMdY09mEHlFupMeUmchFW2XHYK254LdMYbF4ZhjxK9K51UUdQBYH-zZpo0WWtPSZqrPGtT-c4z_sEO73EDVcek3rDwyWiXvjSKDpsZM7NOdKRm5tvT3qNK-7C7WMUjSXDcBzbTFhwfOAOO1n-wMR9H_w0DuIE-yMjEZkOdt7GUIBC8F5izATlZH0FRTx4VAwQWY4gjjQ9-3PbUbHx-NKiFXwCOAsxu-79PiF0HDEHb6ZOCGywNmKuanEXqLonli0caZiUZfrdT53y3Xnd3W2SEr6s7ZQxWnQO5PeOU7BQYA" \
--header "X-Signature: sha256 " \
--header "X-Nonce-Str: VYNknZohxwicZMaWbNdBKUrnrxDtaRhN" \
--header "X-Timestamp: 1528450585" \
```


### Response Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description                                                                                               | Example   |
| --------- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `item`    | String | Topup payment url                                                                                         |           |
| `code`    | String | Successfully call this endpoint. If fail, will return error code object (Refer `Appendix 1: Error Codes`) | "SUCCESS" |


> Example Response

```json
{
    "item": "http://localhost:5001/v1/checkout?checkoutId=1612427954630524631",
    "code": "SUCCESS"
}
```
